central

Class QuizController

  • java.lang.Object
    • central.QuizController

  • public class QuizController
extends java.lang.Object
    This class controls the communication between the view and the model. All data processing like checking answers, selecting a question take place through this class

    • Constructor Detail

      • QuizController

        public QuizController()

    • Method Detail

      • getQuestionDisplay

        public QuestionsAndAnswers getQuestionDisplay(java.lang.String subject)
        This method is invoked whenever the user clicks on "Next" button or selects a topic. It keeps track of the current topic to help keep track of the score.
        Parameters:
        String - Topic name or "Next" if called on click of next.
        Returns:
        QuestionsAndAnswers Question record to be displayed.

      • startQuiz

        public void startQuiz()
        This method is called on the click of the "start quiz" method. it initializes the QuizSession to keep track of score.

      • checkRadioButtonQuestionAnswer

        public void checkRadioButtonQuestionAnswer(java.lang.String selectedButtonText)
        It is called every Time a Radio button is selected and checks if its the right answer. Sets the current Answer status accordingly.
        Parameters:
        String - Option selected by the user

      • checkCheckBoxAnswer

        public void checkCheckBoxAnswer(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> selectedAnswer)
        It is called everytime a checkBox is selected and checks if its the right answer. Sets the current Answer status accordingly.
        Parameters:
        String - Options selected by the user

      • checkAnswer

        public void checkAnswer()
        This method is called whenever the user clicks on the "Next" or "Submit" button. It checks the Answer status (Right/Wrong) and increments the score accordingly.

      • getResultMap

        public java.util.Map<QuizController.Topic,QuizSession> getResultMap()
        Returns:
        Map Returns a map of topic name and the related statistics that are needed to plot a graph

      • setResultMap

        public void setResultMap(java.util.Map<QuizController.Topic,QuizSession> resultMap)
        sets the topic name and the related statistics that are needed to plot a graph into a hash Map

      • checkOneWrdAnswer

        public void checkOneWrdAnswer(java.lang.String userTypedAnswer)
        It is called every time a answer is typed in the text field and checks if its the right answer. Sets the current Answer status accordingly.
        Parameters:
        String - Options selected by the user
